original_text: Then the groups of thin grains ate the seven groups of grains that were good and fat. Then Pharaoh woke up. He realized that it was a dream.
korean_text: 그 가는 일곱 이삭이 무성하고 충실한 일곱 이삭을 삼킨지라 바로가 깬즉 꿈이라

sentences.original_text: Then the groups of thin grains ate the seven groups of grains
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 마른 곡식 단들 일곱 그룹을 먹었고

sentences.original_text: He realized that it was a dream
